bibl.title: An Attic-speaking Crow on the Capitoline: A Literary Émigré from the Hecale.
bibl.note: Explores the possibility that ἔσται πάντα καλῶς at the conclusion of Suetonius' Life of Domitian (23.2) comes from Callimachus' Hecale (fr. 260 Pf. = Suppl. Hell. 288 = frr. 69-70 and 73-74 Hollis).
bibl.seg: CLAUSS James J., An Attic-speaking Crow on the Capitoline: A Literary Émigré from the Hecale.
Explores the possibility that ἔσται πάντα καλῶς at the conclusion of Suetonius' Life of Domitian (23.2) comes from Callimachus' Hecale (fr. 260 Pf. = Suppl. Hell. 288 = frr. 69-70 and 73-74 Hollis).
